PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08492020-10-30TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Transport Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Commercial Vehicle Drivers Hours of Service Regulations and a Related Amendment (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations amending the COMMERCIAL VEHICLE DRIVERS HOURS OF SERVICE REGULATIONS AND A RELATED AMENDMENT (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) eliminate an unnecessary duplication of text in the Regulations and the Technical Standard for Electronic Logging Device; (2) align with the National Safety Code's Standard 9 to ensure that federal regulations are consistently enforced by the Provinces and Territories, and to better reflect current industry practice; (3) clarify the requirements for the accreditation process of certification bodies; (4) correct an erroneous cross-reference; and (5) correct discrepancies between the French and English versions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0240 Publication Date: 2020-11-25
AttachmentsAttachment
